snippet: Marcel Granollers will play Rafael Nadal in the second round of the Barcelona Open after defeating Daniel Munoz de la Nava 6-4, 6-3 on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Marcel Granollers will play Rafael Nadal in the second round of the Barcelona Open after defeating Daniel Munoz de la Nava 6-4, 6-3 on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Granollers Beats De La Nava in Barcelona, Plays Nadal Next
headline.main: Granollers Beats De La Nava in Barcelona, Plays Nadal Next
